languages.text: Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.
languages.original_text: Пироманты управляют огнем и могут разжечь пламя, чтобы изувечить или испепелить врага.

traits.locale_text: Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.
Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.
Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.

languages.text: Pyromantiker sind darauf spezialisiert, Flammen zu erzeugen und zu manipulieren, um ihre Feinde zu verstümmeln und zu Asche zu verbrennen.
languages.original_text: Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.

traits.locale_text: Pyromantiker sind darauf spezialisiert, Flammen zu erzeugen und zu manipulieren, um ihre Feinde zu verstümmeln und zu Asche zu verbrennen.

languages.text: Les pyromanciens sont spécialisés dans la production et la manipulation de flammes visant à mutiler leurs ennemis et à les réduire en cendres.
languages.original_text: Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.

traits.locale_text: Les pyromanciens sont spécialisés dans la production et la manipulation de flammes visant à mutiler leurs ennemis et à les réduire en cendres.

languages.text: 炎术大师擅长召唤、操纵火焰，可以召唤烈焰吞噬敌人，将其化为灰烬。
languages.original_text: Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.

traits.locale_text: 炎术大师擅长召唤、操纵火焰，可以召唤烈焰吞噬敌人，将其化为灰烬。

languages.text: Los piromantes son especialistas en la generación y manipulación de llamas para mutilar a sus enemigos y reducirlos a cenizas.
languages.original_text: Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.

traits.locale_text: Los piromantes son especialistas en la generación y manipulación de llamas para mutilar a sus enemigos y reducirlos a cenizas.

languages.text: パイロマンサーは炎を生成し操り、敵を灰と化すことを専門とする。
languages.original_text: Pyromancers specialise in producing and manipulating flames to maim their enemies and burn them to ash.

traits.locale_text: パイロマンサーは炎を生成し操り、敵を灰と化すことを専門とする。

languages.text: Ateşbazlar, düşmanlarını yaralamak ve yakıp kül etmek için alevler meydana getirip onlara hükmetme konusunda uzmanlaşmıştır.
